name: Zombie sanctuary: Ash
description:
This is a fun 3D mowing magic battle game. Very decompression, press a few keys, move the mouse can feel a pleasant game experience.

Game Features:
■ 3D mowing, special effects full
■ Endless game mode, you can play forever
■ A total of 100 achievements and you can get them all in 10 minutes.

Game play:
■ WSAD moves a female character who automatically launches magic attacks.
■ Mouse can move the Angle of view. Right-click to see the front of the female character.
■ Unlimited mode, female characters will not die, you can see the number of zombies killed slowly increase
